DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include healthy parturients age 18 40 American Society Anesthesiologists physical status I II , uncomplicated , singleton , term pregnancy , schedule undergo cesarean delivery . Exclusion criterion study include refusal participate , American Society Anesthesiologists physical status III high severe uncontrolled medical condition , significant systemic medical obstetric disease , morbid obesity , opioid , Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drug ( NSAID ) , local anesthetic allergy intolerance , chronic analgesic antidepressant use , accidental dural puncture , ineffective spinal epidural , conversion general anesthesia .
